* Iron Raptor snarled and roared, she was sick and tired of this and it was 
going to stop RIGHT NOW!!
With great effort and pain she propped herself up on her one good leg and 
pushed up, now she almost seemed to balance two stories in the air.*

" I will NOT ...go down like anybot did, because I ...will not go down!!"

* Iron Raptor knew that her power was now fading fast, she would soon be 
forced to give up and transform into her normal Beast Mode or even into her 
Robot Mode if she wanted to risk stasis lock!
Iron Raptor looked down at the ant and bared her teeth, she put her broken 
leg on the ground and jerked it so that the gears set back into place. It 
was still broken but she needed it to hold up her weight.
Now, this Predacon had a problem!
Iron Raptor pivited around on her good leg and slammed her tail into Inferno 
with enough force to cave in a wall of alloy!
But that's when she felt it, THE power drain.*

" No! Not now!!!"

* Iron Raptor's computer came on,*
COM: Power failure. Suggest transformation back to Beast Mode!

* She snarled as she felt herself automatically transforming back to Robot 
Mode. Once she had transformed back she fell to her hands and knees, she was 
tired and low on energy. Her internal computer came on again:*
COM:Repeat, suggest transformation back to Beast Mode or stasis lock will 
commence in 6 cycles.
* Iron Raptor got up to one knee and looked around, she would fight to the 
end but in this condition even that wouldn't take long! That's when she saw 
him...*

" Prowl!!"
